articles.title: S&P 500 and Nasdaq rise as Amazon gets traders excited about AI trade again: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: U.S. stocks rose Friday as investors digested strong quarterly results from tech giant Amazon.
articles.content:
The S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite rose on Friday as strong quarterly results from tech giant Amazon spurred investors' confidence in artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Tim Cook says Apple is open to M&A on the AI front - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple CEO Tim Cook noted in the company's Q4 2025 earnings call that Apple was preparing to announce more AI partnerships like the one it has with OpenAI to integrate ChatGPT into Siri and Apple Intelligence.
articles.content:
Apple CEO Tim Cook signaled to investors the company is still open to acquisitions and partnerships to move things forward on the AI front.
